name: Awry Garden
description:
Welcome explorer #38

You are now approaching planet KE-3978. Your mission is to collect select samples from the planet's flora and fauna. 

!!!Danger!!! The planet's atmosphere is filled with the highly toxic element oxygen! Your pack has 1 minute of air before you will be forced to return to your star ship. 

There may also be additional hazards encountered while on the surface. Stay on your toes and get collecting. 

Star Base E, out.

Developer:

Hi I'm 0hSlash! For this project I created the programming and visuals. You can find a log of my work over on twitter at @0hSlash.
